```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```

### First order univariate derivatives

```{r}
# A
fx <- expression(x^2)
df_dx <- D(expr = fx, 'x') 

x<- 3
df_dx_3 <- eval(expr = df_dx)

df_dx_3
```

```{r}
# B 
pa <- expression(2*(3*a + 2)^4 - 5)
dp_da <- D(expr = pa, 'a')

a <- 1.2
dp_da_1_2 <- eval(expr = dp_da)

dp_da_1_2
```

```{r}
#C 
gt <- expression(-4*t/((t^2+1)^3))
dg_dt <- D(expr = gt, 't')

t <- 0 
dg_dt_0 <- eval(expr = dg_dt)

dg_dt_0
```
